INJURY NEWS
Sunday, 7/30/2025
Sunday 3/5/2025 :
Calvin Shuff was injured being hit by a pitch.
Diagnosis: Sprained Wrist.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.

Diagnosis: Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle.
He will be OK in about 5-6 weeks.
